alert.note: Alert for Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:03PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON...SOUTHWESTERN PRINCE GEORGE... NORTHEASTERN SUSSEX AND SOUTHWESTERN SURRY COUNTIES... At 502 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cabin Point to near Homeville to near Sussex, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Waverly around 510 PM EDT. Wakefield and Dendron around 515 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Booth Fork, Carsley, Newville, Templeton, Booker, Prince George Golf, Gwaltney Corner, Lumberton, Manry and Littleton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
